description: A stability-focused portfolio designed for capital protection, low volatility, and steady income. Suited for risk-averse investors.
suitable_for: Retirees or individuals who need predictable returns
People building emergency or buffer funds
recommended_lumpsum_use: Ideal for lump-sum deployment due to low equity exposure
historical_behaviour: Debt component provides stable interest income.
Equity component grows slowly but steadily.
Gold enhances risk protection during inflation cycles.
rebalancing_strategy: Rebalance every 6 months to maintain debt dominance and prevent equity from rising above 25%.
rationale: High debt allocation ensures capital safety and predictable returns.
Low equity ensures limited exposure to market fluctuations.
Gold provides inflation protection and safe-haven diversification.
Small hybrid exposure smooths returns with controlled risk.
